author: Simon Difford
description: The rum and cognac combo from Between the Sheets served as part of the Slow Comfortable genre. As with so many of the Slow Comfortable family of cocktails, when made with freshly squeezed orange juice, this is a tasty, fruity and balanced long drink.
name: Slow Comfortable Screw Between the Sheets
recipeIngredient: 15 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
